description.value:
This cloak is deep green with a voluminous hood, embroidered with gold trim and symbols significant in elven culture. The cloak allows you to cast the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.atlgGNI1E1Ox3O3a]{Ghost Sound} cantrip as an arcane innate spell.

When you adjust the cloak's clasp (an Interact action), the cloak transforms to match the environment around you and muffles your sounds, granting you a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.eeGWTG9ZAha4IIOY]{Effect: Cloak of Elvenkind}

Activate D Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You draw the hood up and gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility}, with the spell's normal duration or until you pull the hood back down, whichever comes first. If you're also wearing @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.T00Xa9aDwHxd60Zh]{Boots of Elvenkind} you can activate this ability twice per day.
